channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Remarkable’s pricey Paper Pro is hundreds off with refurbished deals
item.description: If you compare the value proposition of getting one of Remarkable’s Paper Pro E-Ink tablets vs. buying a laptop, the latter will win in most scenarios. Laptops are more capable, with more ports, apps, and versatility — but they’re much more distracting, too. Avoiding distractions during work or while writing for leisure isn’t easy, and […]

item.title: Ventes de smartphones : Apple devient leader mondial, Samsung tremble et deux outsiders jubilent
item.description: Pour la première fois depuis 14 ans, Samsung n'est plus le premier constructeur mondial de smartphones. Porté par un succès de sa gamme iPhone 17, Apple vient de s'emparer de la couronne. Et le plus fou ? L'écart ne fait que se creuser. Les derniers chiffres de Counterpoint Research sont sans appel.

item.title: Apple Creator Studio suite is launching to take on Adobe
item.description: Apple has announced Apple Creator Studio, a new software suite for Apple products that bundles popular creative apps into an all-in-one subscription service. Apple Creator Studio will be available on the App Store on January 28th, and includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Pixelmator Pro, Motion, Compressor, and MainStage - providing a rival […]...

item.title: NBA League Pass is up to 55 percent off right now
item.description: NBA League Pass, the streaming service that lets you catch hundreds of out-of-market NBA games, is on sale right now for up to 55 percent off. The League Pass Premium subscription is on sale for $75, down from $160, while League Pass Standard is marked down to $50 from $110. We're almost halfway through the season at this point, so it makes sense for a service like League Pass to start offering some discounts. The Standard plan includes commercials and support for only one device at a time, while the Premium tier offers no commercials, in-arena streams during breaks in the game, offline viewin...

item.title: India reportedly tells quick-commerce firms to drop 10-minute delivery promise
item.description: India's labor ministry is pushing the country's booming quick-commerce sector to prioritize the wellness and safety of its gig workers.

item.title: The LG C5 OLED is still the best TV that we recommend in 2026 — and it just received a staggering $1,300 discount at Best Buy
item.description: The LG C5 OLED TV is still our best-rated TV of 2026, and the 65-inch model just received a staggering $1,300 discount, bringing the price down to £1,399.

item.title: Jony Ive and Sam Altman’s First AI Gadget May Try to Kill AirPods
item.description: Thank god someone is brave enough to take down many people's favorite wireless earbuds.

item.title: Hackers claim to have Target source code for sale following recent cyberattack
item.description: A Target database of almost 900GB was allegedly stolen and being sold in smaller batches.

item.title: Après Air France, le plus grand groupe aérien européen choisit également Starlink
item.description: Quelques mois après l'annonce d'Air France, c'est au tour de Lufthansa de jeter l'éponge face à ses partenaires historiques pour signer avec Starlink.

item.title: ElevenLabs CEO says the voice AI startup crossed $330 million ARR last year
item.description: The company said it took only five months to go from $200 million to $330 million in annual recurring revenue.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : quoi de mieux que courir dans le froid avec une de ces 9 montres connectées à prix soldé ? Le TOP des bons plans
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver permettent de faire de bonnes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech, dont les montres connectées ! Ces accessoires lifestyle & sport profitent eux aussi d’une vague de promotions : voici les offres à retenir.

item.title: Ubisoft announces layoffs at The Division studio Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm amid restructuring efforts
item.description: Ubisoft has announced job cuts at The Division studio, Massive Entertainment, and Ubisoft Stockholm as part of ongoing cost-cutting efforts.

item.title: La France ne peut pas interdire les réseaux sociaux aux moins de 15 ans : le rappel à l’ordre du Conseil d’État
item.description: La proposition de loi visant à protéger les mineurs en ligne, examinée ce mardi 13 janvier en commission des Affaires culturelles de l'Assemblée nationale, est en passe d'être rabotée... après un avis du Conseil d'État. Le texte fait partie des trois initiatives législatives qui veulent interdire les réseaux sociaux aux mineurs.

item.title: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams accused of $2.5 million crypto ‘rug pull’ as his NYC Token crashes
item.description: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams has come under fire after his new cryptocurrency token crashed just hours following its launch on Monday. As reported by CoinDesk, Adams' "NYC Token" hit a $580 million market capitalization at its peak before plummeting to around $130 million at this time of writing. Data from the blockchain analysis platform, […]

item.title: Archaeologists in Sicily Discover an Ancient Stylus With an Erection. Yes, That Kind of Erection
item.description: The over 2,400-year-old ceramist's stylus likely features Dionysus...and his other bits.

item.title: De nombreux produits Samsung sont à prix cassés durant les soldes : smartphones, TV, tablettes…
item.description: Samsung profite des soldes d’hiver pour proposer une avalanche de réductions sur ses meilleurs produits. Entre ses Galaxy S et A, ses téléviseurs QLED et OLED, tablettes et écouteurs sans fil, de nombreuses références phares de la marque sud-coréenne voient leur prix chuter, rendant le moment idéal pour s’équiper ou se faire plaisir à moindre coût. ...

item.title: Games Workshop Rejects the Abominable Intelligence
item.description: The makers of 'Warhammer' declare heresy on generative AI, banning its use in the company's design process.

item.title: I'm a lifelong iPhone user, but a few months with Gemini on Android have shown me exactly why Apple and Google's AI partnership is what everyone needs
item.description: For the first time in years, I’m excited about the future of the iPhone. And that excitement is coming from Google, not Cupertino.

item.title: Docusign’s AI will now help you understand what you’re signing
item.description: The company is rolling out new features to help signers understand contract terms and help contract creators more quickly set up agreements for signature. New AI tools from Docusign aim to make contracts easier to understand and quicker to prepare.

item.title: Toujours aussi léger, le vélo électrique Origine Montmartre fait toujours plus dans le Made in France
item.description: Dans sa version cadre ouvert, le vélo électrique urbain Origine Montmartre offre dorénavant le choix entre deux courroies dont la toute nouvelle Hutchinson Crossdyn, fabriquée en France.

item.title: Dreame brings 8K video to compact action cameras
item.description: Dreame, a Chinese company known for its unique robot vacuums and floor cleaners, expanded its offerings at CES 2026, such as a $700 floor lamp that doubled as a hair dryer. But more interesting is the debut of the company's first action camera. The Leaptic Cube features a design similar to the DJI Osmo Nano […]

item.title: Trump is headed to this Detroit Ford factory to promote U.S. manufacturing
item.description: The president’s trip will include a visit to a Dearborn factory that make the F-150 pickup, a bestseller in the U.S. President Donald Trump will travel to Michigan on Tuesday to promote his efforts to boost U.S. manufacturing, trying to counter fears about a weakening job market and worries that still-rising prices are taking a toll on Americans’ pocketbooks.The day trip will include a tour of a Ford factory in Dearborn that makes F-150 pickups, the bestselling domestic vehicle in the U.S. The Republican president is also set to address the Detroit Economic Club at the MotorCity Casino.Novembe...

item.title: Proton's Lifetime account raffle raises $1.27 million for digital rights advocates
item.description: With the money generated from its 2025 Lifetime Account Charity Fundraiser, Proton has awarded grants to ten community-chosen groups defending privacy online and digital rights.

item.title: Marvel won’t let you forget Avengers: Doomsday is coming
item.description: A little over a year ago, Marvel spent the better part of an entire day slowly revealing the massive cast for Avengers: Doomsday. More recently, the studio started dropping teaser trailers featuring some of the movie's more notable superhero team-ups and returning characters. There was already plenty of hype around the project, which seems poised […]...

item.title: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams Accused of Crypto Pump and Dump With NYC Token
item.description: Adams has wasted no time finding his true calling.

item.title: Businesses are finally taking action to crack down on AI security risks
item.description: Nearly all business leaders agree AI will be the thing that changes their cybersecurity strategies the most this year.

item.title: Microsoft scrambles to quell fury around its new AI data centers
item.description: It looks like the wave of campaigns against data centers are getting under big tech companies' skin - and Microsoft is the latest giant to promise to address frustrations on the ground in communities around their data centers. The company announced a five-point plan today that it calls "Community-First AI Infrastructure." That includes paying more […]...

item.title: These are the real reasons Gen Z wants a four-day workweek
item.description: Not only does the youngest generation of workers think this shift is ideal—they also think it’s inevitable. In the summer of 2024, Squarespace’s chief marketing officer, Kinjil Mathur, attracted criticism when she told Gen Z job seekers that they, like her, should be “willing to do anything” to land their first job.

item.title: Microsoft s’alarme : l’IA chinoise gagne du terrain dans les pays en voie de développement
item.description: L'IA générative chinoise gagne du terrain en dehors des marchés occidentaux. En Afrique, en Asie, les modèles « low cost » et ouverts développés par DeepSeek séduisent les utilisateurs bien davantage que les modèles américains, chers et fermés, d'OpenAI ou de Google. Microsoft tire la sonnette d'alarme.

item.title: Grok will be included in the Pentagon’s network as controversy surrounds the AI chatbot
item.description: Pete Hegseth embraced the Grok chatbot during a speech at SpaceX in Texas. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Monday that Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok will join Google’s generative AI engine in operating inside the Pentagon network, as part of a broader push to feed as much of the military’s data as possible into the developing technology.“Very soon we will have the world’s leading AI models on every unclassified and classified network throughout our department,” Hegseth said in a speech at Musk’s space flight company, SpaceX, in South Texas.The announcement comes just day...

item.title: Anthropic launches Claude Cowork, a version of its coding AI for regular people
item.description: If you follow Anthropic, you're probably familiar with Claude Code. Since the fall of 2024, the company has been training its AI models to use and navigate computers like a human would, and the coding agent has been the most practical expression of that work, giving developers a way to automate rote programming tasks. Starting today, Anthropic is giving regular people a way to take advantage of those capabilities, with the release of a new preview feature called Claude Cowork.The company is billing Cowork as "a simpler way for anyone — not just developers — to work with Claude." After you give...

item.title: DDoS in 2025: what a difference a year makes
item.description: DDoS attacks in 2025 are faster, smarter, and larger, outpacing traditional telecom defenses.

item.title: US government told to patch high-severity Gogs security issue or face attack
item.description: A new bug made its way to CISA's KEV, after being used as a zero-day.

item.title: Anker’s apocalypse-ready home battery system lands to take on Tesla –and it can help you survive for 15 days off-grid
item.description: Anker’s Solix E10 is a modular battery system that can power up your home whatever the weather.

item.title: Revolut déploie une arme fatale pour vous protéger des faux conseillers bancaires
item.description: Une appli bancaire qui vous prévient en plein appel que la personne au bout du fil n’est pas vraiment votre banque : c’est la nouvelle arme de Revolut contre les arnaques par usurpation d’identité, dopées aux deepfakes et à l’IA.

item.description: Between leaks, rumors, and past form, we've come up with predictions for every camera on every Samsung Galaxy S26 model.

item.title: C’est la grande braderie des PC portables gaming et bureautique : le TOP 9 des offres des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis près d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Sonos Arc Ultra : cette barre de son premium notée 9/10 est à un super prix pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: La Sonos Arc Ultra, c’est l’arme fatale pour transformer un simple téléviseur en scène Dolby Atmos. En ce moment, elle revient à un super prix pour les soldes 2026 sur Amazon avec une réduction immédiate, faisant passer son prix de 999 euros à 799 euros.

item.title: Ends tomorrow! New customers at Verizon can get $200 with a new line, plus a free iPhone 17 Pro Max and other excellent deals
item.description: Verizon's excellent bonus gift for new customers ends tomorrow - don't hesitate to switch if you want a $200 egift card for cheaper bills.

item.title: AI browsers are creating a new governance gap
item.description: Embedded AI in browsers accelerates work while eroding document control, traceability, and trust.

item.title: reMarkable E Ink tablet bundles are up to $90 off right now
item.description:
E Ink tablet maker reMarkable is running a bundle deal right now that can save you between $80 and $90 when buying a reMarkable 2 along with a Marker stylus and a folio case. The savings vary depending on the bundle you configure, but this can bring your out-the-door cost down to $449 from $529 for the tablet, Marker stylus and polymer weave book folio.
The company also sells a newer stylus called Marker Plus that lets you erase by flipping it around just like a real pencil, but that will cost you an extra $50. If you’ve been eyeing a dedicated writing tablet for work, school or just jotting...

item.description: 'Monarch: Legacy of Monsters' returns to Apple TV on February 27, and it's bringing a terrifying new Titan with it.

And now that we've (sort of) recovered, it's time to answer any questions you still have. Did we replace Dom with his clone? Did Jen survive a robot falling on her? Is Vee […]

item.title: Meta refocuses on AI hardware as metaverse layoffs begin
item.description: As we expected, Meta has begun laying off more than 1,000 employees from its Reality Labs division, which focused on virtual reality and metaverse products, Bloomberg reports. The company will refocus on developing wearables, like its recent batch of AI-powered Ray-Ban smart glasses, according to a memo from CTO Andrew Bosworth.The news isn’t too surprising. Reality Labs has lost more than $70 billion since the beginning of 2021, and while Meta has done a solid job of delivering desirable consumer VR headsets and smart glasses, that business hasn’t been nearly profitable enough to justify the ...

item.title: Internet censorship hit 'half the world’s population' in 2025, Surfshark warns – and 2026 is already looking grim
item.description: Surfshark reports that 4.6 billion people suffered from internet censorship last year. The trend continues in full swing in the first weeks of 2026 across Iran, Pakistan, and Jammu & Kashmir.

item.title: Connor Storrie shares a surprising Heated Rivalry story in Seth Meyers interview
item.description: "Heated Rivalry" star Connor Storrie told Seth Meyers that a Russian background actor on the show truly thought he was fluent.

item.title: Apple bundles creative apps such as Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro into a single subscription
item.description: Apple has been putting more onus on its services for the past several years — the company makes tens of billions of dollars in revenue from that side of the business, which it claimed had a record year in 2025. Apple is nudging a little more in that direction with a new subscription bundle called Apple Creator Studio.This allows creators to pay a single fee ($13 per month or $129 per year) to use Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Pixelmator Pro, Motion, Compressor and MainStage. Subscribers will get access to “premium content” in Pages, Keynote and Numbers (as well as in Freeform later this year). Of ...

item.title: Microsofts Copilot is coming for your File Explorer
item.description: Microsoft seems to be adding Copilot to yet another part of Windows.

item.title: Trump asks tech companies to “pay their own way” for their data centers
item.description: Energy costs rose by more than 5% on average between 2024 and 2025 – tackling data centers is the key, says Trump.

item.title: This Samsung 1TB T7 is the best value external SSD I have seen in weeks — at just $99, save a whopping $60
item.description: Samsung’s 1TB T7 portable SSD falls to $99, offering fast USB-C storage for less.

item.title: Microsoft Has a Plan to Keep Its Data Centers From Raising Your Electric Bill
item.description: In response to a growing backlash, Microsoft said it would take steps to ensure that data centers don’t raise utility bills in surrounding areas and address other public concerns.

item.title: Final Cut, Logic Pro et Pixelmator Pro : Apple regroupe ses logiciels créatifs dans un abonnement à 12,99 €
item.description: Apple lance un nouvel abonnement tout compris pour ses utilisateurs les plus créatifs. Pour 12,99 € par mois, l'Apple Creator Studio offre l'accès aux versions complètes de Final Cut Pro, de Logic Pro et de Pixelmator Pro sur Mac et sur iPad, sans oublier des « contenus premium » pour Keynote, Pages, Numbers et Freeform.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : jusqu’à 55 % de réduction sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs dans cette sélection des 15 meilleurs deals
item.description: Avec les soldes d'hiver, les e-commerçants comptent bien écouler leurs TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs par palettes ! Les meilleures offres du moment se trouvent dans cette sélection, et on y trouve aussi bien des modèles premium que abordables.

item.title: BitGo IPO: Date, BTGO share price for crypto firm’s closely watched NYSE public debut
item.description: After last year’s successful cryptocurrency-related offerings, BitGo’s IPO is one of the most highly anticipated in 2026. 2025 saw several successful public offerings, especially from companies operating in the AI, cryptocurrency, and fintech spaces. What many on Wall Street are anxious to know is whether the IPO market—and its returns—will accelerate in 2026, or if investors will take a more cautious approach to newly public companies as inflationary pressures, the potential for a weakening economy, and a possible AI bubble weigh heavily on people’s minds....

item.title: Nurses strike in New York City enters day 2, as a severe flu season rages on
item.description: The walkout involves nearly 15,000 nurses over multiple locations, including NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia and Mount Sinai hospital. Thousands of New York City nurses were set to return to the picket lines Tuesday as their strike targeting some of the city’s leading hospital systems entered its second day.The walkout, which comes during a severe flu season, involved roughly 15,000 nurses spread out across multiple private hospitals, including NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia, Montefiore Medical Center and Mount Sinai hospital.The affected hospitals have hired droves of temporary nurses to try to ...

item.title: Amazon lance une vague de promotions juste avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Même sans l’annoncer officiellement, Amazon casse les prix sur une multitude de produits Tech pendant les soldes. Et bonne nouvelle : la 2ᵉ démarque arrive à grands pas ! C’est le moment rêvé pour faire de vraies bonnes affaires et démarrer 2026 du bon pied.

item.title: The MSI Vector A16 just beat the record for the cheapest RTX 5070 gaming laptop we've ever seen
item.description: Get the MSI Vector A16 for $700 off at Walmart and score an RTX 5070 gaming laptop for the lowest price we've ever seen.

item.title: Apple lance Creator Studio : voici ce que contient le nouvel abonnement tout-en-un qui va faire très mal à Adobe
item.description: Vous l'attendiez ? Il est là. Pixelmator Pro débarque enfin sur iPad, mais il n'arrive pas seul. Apple lance Creator Studio, un bundle regroupant ses logiciels pros dopés à l'IA.

item.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
item.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.
